Data Fields
CSL_SecProxyThreadCfg Struct Reference
Secure Proxy » SEC_PROXY Data Structures

This structure contains configuration parameters for each sec_proxy thread. More...

#include <csl_sec_proxy.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t outboundMaxMsgCnt
 
uint32_t outboundDstThread
 
uint32_t queueNum
 
uint32_t threshCnt
 
uint32_t errEvtNum
 
uint32_t threshEvtNum
 

Detailed Description

This structure contains configuration parameters for each sec_proxy thread.

Field Documentation

uint32_t CSL_SecProxyThreadCfg::errEvtNum

Threshold count that causes proxy thread events

uint32_t CSL_SecProxyThreadCfg::outboundDstThread

Max message count allowed for an outbound proxy thread (valid only when dir==0)

uint32_t CSL_SecProxyThreadCfg::outboundMaxMsgCnt

Direction for the proxy thread: 0 = outbound, write only, 1 = inbound, read only

uint32_t CSL_SecProxyThreadCfg::queueNum

The proxy thread that is the destination of messages from this outbound proxy thread (valid only when dir==0)

uint32_t CSL_SecProxyThreadCfg::threshCnt

Queue number in the target to use for the proxy thread. Note that this value is relative to the queue # inferred by the sec_proxy TARGET address MMR.

uint32_t CSL_SecProxyThreadCfg::threshEvtNum

Event number for an error from the proxy thread
